/* Early life */ Removed reference to her claims of an "army career" on Question Time. She in fact said she "worked for a while in the military", which is accurate. The sentenced removed was patently biased.
Removed biased opinions re: Question time
I have added more information about he second appearance on BBC ONE talk show question time.
/* Political life */ She appeared on QT tonight too.
For fuck's sake, can't people even use capital letters correctly these days?

Some confusion here- she was on £90,000 BEFORE going on the Apprentice, but she took the Met Office job after. So the £90,000 has no connection with the Met Office.
